text: Terence Frisby (28 November 1932 - 23 April 2020) was a British playwright, actor, stage director and producer. He was best known as the author of the play There's a Girl in My Soup. He also helped write the screenplay for the movie version of the play. Frisby was born in London. Frisby died on 23 April 2020, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British playwrights Category:British stage actors Category:Screenwriters from London
title: Terence Frisby
